name: 張玲毓
objective:
本課程之內容包括：化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論，動力學數據之處理，各式理想反應器之設計，非理想狀態反應器之討論，單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

Week 2 Overview of chemical reaction engineering 
Week 3 Ch. 1 Mole Balances
Week 4 Ch. 2 Conversion and Reactor Sizing 
Week 5 Ch. 2 Conversion and Reactor Sizing

Week 8 Ch. 3-4 Rate Law and Stoichiometry

Week 11 Ch. 5 Isothermal Reactor Design: Conversion 
Week 12 Second mid-term
Week 13 Ch. 5 Isothermal Reactor Design: Conversion
Week 14 Ch. 8 Multiple Reactions
Week 15 Ch. 8 Multiple Reactions (Quiz or Group discussion)
Week 16 Ch. 8 Multiple Reactions
Week 17 Ch. 8 Multiple Reactions
Week 18 final term
scorePolicy:

2. Quiz 20%
